title: The Battery, ignition and electrical system
creator_credit: Gene K Walker Productions and United States. Office of Education
brief_description: Designed for the motor mechanic and trainee, this film shows how to check and service a battery, how to check the starting motor and generator, how to inspect low tension wiring, how to check the lighting circuit and electrical instruments, how to test the voltage and current regulator, and how to check and test the ignition system.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene K Walker Productions and United States. Office of Education
